requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu and its derivatives
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 205 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Minimum recommended screen resolution: 1280 X 720 (16:9)

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 205 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Minimum recommended screen resolution: 1280 X 720 (16:9)
